sections.heading: Terms to include blockchain technology.
sections.text:
47-1-4. Terms to include blockchain technology.

As used in title 47, the terms, electronic, electronic transmission, or electronically transmitted, include blockchain technology, as defined in ยง53-12-1.

Source:SL 2019, ch 207, ยง2.
